name: Nimiko TimeTravel
description:
Made for the DINOJAM1 https://itch.io/jam/dinojam1

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Still work in progress, level 1 and 2 are ready, 3 and 4 to be completed.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

In 2245 XLabs created the first TravelMachine.
Time Travel it is possible but there are few issues :

  •  We cannot select the time were to go
  •  The people that travel to the past land in random places
  •  To return back to the current time they have to find 
  • The travel machine (also in another random place).

You are a Cobra Team soldier . 
Your team are you are ready to go to any location
with the travel machine.
When you land in the location your your goal is to find 

  • Your team members
  • All the equipment
  • Make a base camp
  • Return back to the current time 

-----------------------------

Created With Unity, Krita and Blender 3D.

Design, Development and Graphics Mauro Rilla - https://misterm.itch.io

Royalty Free Music - Heroic Intrusion by https://patrickdearteaga.com

-----------------------------

All the Dinosaurs models are available to download in blender format.
